keyEvents.title: First Appearance of Lovely Land
keyEvents.description: The golden castle headquarters of the Accino Family appears for the first time.
keyEvents.significance: Serves as the main antagonist base for the Ice Hunter Arc climax.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Lost at Lovely Land
keyEvents.description: Zoro arrives at Lovely Land but wanders aimlessly through it, completely lost.
keyEvents.significance: Comedic moment while setting up Zoro's presence for future encounters.

description: A golden castle fortress that serves as the headquarters of the Accino Family. Despite being located in the frozen Hyokaido region, Lovely Land maintains a tropical climate due to Don Accino's heat-based powers. The castle contains Don Accino's vast collection of pirate flags from crews he has defeated.
geography: A large golden castle structure surrounded by tropical vegetation, standing in stark contrast to the surrounding frozen landscape of Hyokaido.
climate: Tropical, artificially maintained by Don Accino's powers

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Brindo
keyEvents.description: Luffy battles Brindo in the frozen region of Hyokaido.
keyEvents.significance: Continues the Ice Hunter Arc battles.

keyEvents.title: Usopp vs Arbell and Salchow
keyEvents.description: Usopp faces the skating couple in Hyokaido's frozen environment.
keyEvents.significance: Tests Usopp's abilities against coordinated opponents.

description: A frozen island region controlled by the Accino Family, characterized by its icy terrain and harsh cold climate. The island features Lovely Land at its center.

keyEvents.title: Lil Visits Robin on Sunny
keyEvents.description: Lil appears aboard the Thousand Sunny and bonds with Robin.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the developing relationship between Robin and Lil.

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' second ship, built by Franky and the Galley-La Company. A brigantine-rigged sloop with a lion figurehead.

keyEvents.title: Franky Defeats Hockera
keyEvents.description: Franky defeats Hockera inside the submarine but exhausts his cola.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the consequences of Franky's cola dependency.

keyEvents.title: Submarine Frozen
keyEvents.description: The Shark Submerge is frozen solid by Hockera's ice pucks, trapping Franky and Nami.
keyEvents.significance: Creates a crisis requiring rescue of two Straw Hats.

description: A submarine vessel used during the Ice Hunter Arc that becomes frozen by Hockera's ice-based attacks, trapping Franky and Nami inside.
